variants.Description in input context: c.1145G>A (p.G382D) mutation in PINK1 associated with Parkinson's disease

Material used.Description: SH-SY5Y cells expressing wild-type and mutant PINK1 were used.

Readout description.Result Description: Cells with PINK1 p.G382D showed a 40% decrease in mitochondrial membrane potential compared to wild-type controls.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent biological replicates were performed.

Technical replicates.Description: Each experiment was repeated in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type PINK1-expressing cells were used as positive controls.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector-transfected cells were used as negative controls.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Two-way ANOVA with Bonferroni post-hoc test.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Mitochondrial membrane potential â‰¥ 85% of wild-type levels

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Mitochondrial membrane potential < 70% of wild-type levels
